messages.title: MAKE IT WORK WITH DENISE BURKE
messages.content: Denise is passionate about North Norfolk. She loves the contrast between towns and villages, the coast and countryside. Denise stands for local produce and a great place to live, work, and visit, but challenges that many people are finding it tough as costs rise while incomes are squeezed. Denise wants to stand up for ordinary families and fight for affordable housing and transport, living wage for all, and better services for children and older people.

messages.title: Act on Ambulances
messages.content: Denise Burke is committed to making a big difference in North Norfolk with her Act on Ambulances campaign.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Denise wants to fight for affordable housing and liveable jobs, ensuring local housing is within the reach of many families.
Denise will advocate for affordable transport options.
Denise supports a living wage for everyone in North Norfolk.
Denise aims to ensure better services for children and older people.

issues.economy: Denise mentions the issues of rising fuel and energy bills, job security, and the squeeze on incomes.
issues.environment: Denise expresses a passion for the local countryside and advocates for local produce.
issues.health: Denise is involved with the Act on Ambulances campaign to improve local health services.

housing.content: Denise Burke will stand up for ordinary families and fight for affordable housing and a living wage.

leaflet.personalStatement: Denise expresses her connection and passion to North Norfolk and her desire to make a difference on local issues.

politicalExperience.role: Labour's Parliamentary candidate for North Norfolk

leaflet.additionalNotes: Denise has appeared on Come Dine With Me recently. She lives in Happisburgh with her husband, Stephen, their two dogs, and two cats.
